Package org.example.demo1.controller

Class CheckoutController

java.lang.Object
org.example.demo1.controller.CheckoutController
@Controller public class CheckoutController extends Object
the controller which is responsible for the checkout (after the user done with adding food to the cart)\n and the order confirmation page

  • Method Details

    • showCheckoutPage

      @GetMapping("/checkout") public String showCheckoutPage(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      opens the checkout page with the total payment of the cart anf user details input. if the cart is empty the user get send back to the menu page.

    • completeOrder

      @PostMapping("/confirm-order") public String completeOrder(@RequestParam String name, @RequestParam String phone, @RequestParam String email, @RequestParam String city, @RequestParam String street, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      saves the foods array, online delivery and user to the appropriate tables, empties the cart and move to the order success page. if there are validation errors move to the error page.
